property.content: {{include reference="PhenoTips.PatientSheetMacros" /}} {{include reference="PhenoTips.TabelarDataMacros" /}} {{velocity}} #macro (__sequencingReport_addTool $classname) {{html clean="false"}}NEW ENTRY{{/html}} {{icon name="question-circle" cssClass="xHelpButton" title="$services.localization.render("${classname}_hint").replace('"', '~~~"')"/}} #end ## #macro (__sequencingReports_displayCompact $dataClassName $options) #set($dataClass = $xwiki.getDocument($dataClassName).xWikiClass) #if ($dataClass) #set($dataObjects = $doc.getObjects($dataClassName)) #if ($dataObjects.size() == 0) (% class="hint" %)None specified #else #set ($counter = 0)## #foreach ($o in $dataObjects) (% class="extradata-list#if ("$!{options.labels}" == 'true') withLabel#end#if ("$!{options.counter}" == 'true') withCounter#end" id="extradata-list-${dataClassName}#if("$!{options.propertyName}" != '')-$!{options.propertyValue}#end" %) #set ($counter = $counter + 1)## #foreach($prop in $dataClass.properties) #if ($prop.name == 'file_attachments') |=|=|=|= |=$counter.|= ${prop.translatedPrettyName}:|$doc.display($prop.getName(), $o)|x #elseif ($prop.name == 'evaluation_type') |=|=${prop.translatedPrettyName}:|$doc.display($prop.getName(), $o)| #if ($o.getProperty('evaluation_type').value == 'targetGenes') |=|=|$doc.display('target_genes', $o)| #elseif ($o.getProperty('evaluation_type').value == 'panel') |=|=|$doc.display('panel', $o)| #elseif ($o.getProperty('evaluation_type').value == 'deldup') |=|=|$doc.display('deldup', $o)| #elseif ($o.getProperty('evaluation_type').value == 'wes') |=|=|$doc.display('wes', $o)| #elseif ($o.getProperty('evaluation_type').value == 'wgs') |=|=|$doc.display('wgs', $o)| #end #elseif (!$prop.name.endsWith('target_genes') && !$prop.name.endsWith('panel') && !$prop.name.endsWith('deldup') && !$prop.name.endsWith('wes') && !$prop.name.endsWith('wgs'))|=|=${prop.translatedPrettyName}:|$doc.display($prop.getName(), $o)| #end #end## #end## foreach object #end## if $dataObjects.size() #end## if dataclass #end ## ## #set ($targetClass = $xwiki.getDocument('PhenoTips.SequencingReportClass').xWikiClass) #set ($targetClassName = 'PhenoTips.SequencingReportClass') #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $doc.getObject($targetClassName)) (% class="sequencing-reports" %)((( === Sequencing reports === ##__extradata_displayTable($targetClassName, {'counter' : true, 'labels' : true, 'mode' : $xcontext.action}) #__sequencingReports_displayCompact($targetClassName, {'counter' : true, 'labels' : true, 'mode' : $xcontext.action}) ))) #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit')(% class="list-actions" %)(((#__sequencingReport_addTool($targetClassName))))#end #end {{/velocity}}

property.parameters: title=Sequencing Reports enabled=true required= order=1 fields=reports_history
